setActiveBets([]);// Mark any still-active local bet slips as lost on crash
setBetSlips(prev=>prev.map(slip=>slip.status==='active'?{...slip,status:'lost'}:slip));// Refresh bet history from backend to reflect losses

useEffect(()=>{if(gameState==='crashed'){console.log('ðŸ”„ Processing crash state - will transition to loading after 2 seconds');// Immediately mark any active bet as lost

fetchCurrentGame().catch(error=>{console.error('Error fetching game state after crash transition:',error);});fetchGameHistory().catch(error=>{console.warn('Error refreshing game history after crash transition:',error);});},3000);return()=>clearTimeout(crashTimeout);}},[gameState]);// Effects - handle loading after crash transition
useEffect(()=>{if(gameState==='loading_after_crash'){console.log('ðŸ”„ Processing crash loading state...');// Set a timeout to transition from loading to waiting state

setGameState('waiting');// Then transition to waiting

return()=>clearTimeout(transitionTimeout);}},[gameState]);// Only check bet state when game becomes active, not during gameplay
useEffect(()=>{if(gameState==='playing'){// Check bet state only once when game becomes active

useEffect(()=>{if(gameState==='waiting'&&timeLeft>0){// Set a timeout to check if countdown is stuck

useEffect(()=>{if(gameState!=='waiting'){countdownStartDetected.current=false;previousTimeLeft.current=0;if(countdownStartTimeout.current){clearTimeout(countdownStartTimeout.current);}}},[gameState]);// Keep a ref in sync with the state to make race-free decisions during polling

const pollForUpdates=async()=>{try{// Always poll, even during crash loading state, but with reduced frequency
